name: Peanut Butter Chili
author: EuroGirl6
summary: Who would have thought beans and peanut butter could go together in harmony? They do, in this satisfying vegetarian chili.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Place the diced tomatoes, water, garlic, and bay leaves into a saucepan, and bring to a simmer over high heat
Reduce heat to medium-low, and season with the cayenne pepper, chili powder, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning
After 15 minutes, pour in the black beans and kidney beans; return to a simmer, and cook for 5 minutes
Stir in the peanut butter until dissolved, then remove and discard the bay leaves, and season the chili with salt and pepper to taste
